doc.title: GPU

value.content: The GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) is a computer component similar to the CPU (Central Processing Unit). It specializes in the drawing of graphics (both 2D and 3D) on your monitor.

doc.summary: The GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) is a computer component similar to the CPU (Central Processing Unit). It specializes in the drawing of graphics (both 2D and 3D) on your monitor.
